alert.note: Alert for Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 1:35PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. .Recent and ongoing rains in the Ohio River basin are expected to cause rises in the river which will last a week or more. Some locations will go into flood. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday evening and continue rising to a crest of 43.2 feet Monday, January 10th. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
